topic.title: DECISION SUPPORT TOOLS FOR NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE CARRIED OUT (STANDARD ACUTE HOSPITAL SETTING)
topic.shortdesc: For the NHS Continuing Healthcare Data Set, an acute care setting is where a PATIENT receives active short-term treatment for a severe injury or episode of illness, an urgent medical condition, or during recovery from surgery.
